name: Nuclear - Archive Edition
description:
This is an archive edition release of my 2014 comic, Nuclear. It's a comic about time, and coming back to something different than what you left behind.

I've decided to slowly re-release older works that have otherwise disappeared from the internet, and present them alongside my own thoughts and reflections. Nuclear is the first re-release!

The comic is 11 pages, and this archive edition includes an author's note and 2 pages of developmental extras/insights. It is free/pay-what-you-want, and I deeply appreciate any generosity you want to throw my way!
